name: Base FHIR Conformance Statement (Full)
description: This is the base conformance statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the full set of functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own conformance statements from

rest.documentation: All the functionality defined in FHIR

security.description: This is the conformance statement to declare that the server supports SMART-on-FHIR. See the SMART-on-FHIR docs for the extension that would go with such a server

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: active | unconfirmed | confirmed | inactive | resolved | refuted | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: onset
searchParam.documentation: Date(/time) when manifestations showed

searchParam.name: last-date
searchParam.documentation: Date(/time) of last known occurrence of a reaction

searchParam.name: severity
searchParam.documentation: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: allergy | intolerance - Underlying mechanism (if known)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When recorded

searchParam.name: reporter
searchParam.documentation: Source of the information about the allergy

searchParam.name: substance
searchParam.documentation: Substance, (or class) considered to be responsible for risk

searchParam.name: criticality
searchParam.documentation: CRITL | CRITH | CRITU

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: food | medication | environment | other - Category of Substance

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who the sensitivity is for

searchParam.name: recorder
searchParam.documentation: Who recorded the sensitivity

searchParam.name: route
searchParam.documentation: How the subject was exposed to the substance

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: External ids for this item

searchParam.name: manifestation
searchParam.documentation: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event

searchParam.documentation: Detail type of activity

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who care plan is for

searchParam.name: activitydate
searchParam.documentation: Specified date occurs within period specified by CarePlan.activity.timingSchedule

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time period plan covers

searchParam.name: related
searchParam.documentation: A combination of the type of relationship and the related plan

searchParam.name: relatedcode
searchParam.documentation: Both code and one of the value parameters

searchParam.name: relatedplan
searchParam.documentation: Both code and one of the value parameters

searchParam.name: subject

searchParam.name: effectivetime
searchParam.documentation: Date administration happened (or did not happen)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: MedicationAdministration event status (for example one of active/paused/completed/nullified)

searchParam.name: prescription
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a prescription to list administrations from

searchParam.name: notgiven
searchParam.documentation: Administrations that were not made

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication code

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations with this external identifier

searchParam.name: value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: value-date
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a date or period of time

searchParam.name: value-string
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a string, and also searches in CodeableConcept.text

searchParam.name: component-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: component-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: component-code
searchParam.documentation: The component code of the observation type

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the observation

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of observation

searchParam.name: code-value-x
searchParam.documentation: Both code and one of the value parameters

searchParam.documentation: All patients linked to the given patient

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The organization at which this person is a patient

searchParam.name: family
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the family name of the patient

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: Whether the patient record is active

searchParam.name: gender
searchParam.documentation: Gender of the patient

searchParam.name: language
searchParam.documentation: Language code (irrespective of use value)

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A patient identifier

searchParam.name: phonetic
searchParam.documentation: A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: One of the locations at which this practitioner provides care

searchParam.name: communication
searchParam.documentation: One of the languages that the practitioner can communicate with

searchParam.documentation: A country specified in an address

searchParam.documentation: The identity of the organization the practitioner represents / acts on behalf of

searchParam.name: telecom

searchParam.name: role
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner can perform this role at for the organization

searchParam.name: gender
searchParam.documentation: Gender of the practitioner

searchParam.name: specialty
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner has this specialty at an organization

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A practitioner's Identifier

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postalCode specified in an address

searchParam.name: message
searchParam.documentation: The first resource in the bundle, if the bundle type is "message" - this is a message header, and this parameter provides access to search its contents

searchParam.name: composition
searchParam.documentation: The first resource in the bundle, if the bundle type is "document" - this is a composition, and this parameter provides access to searches its contents

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | history | searchset | collection
